description:
*New Feature: Repeat for "1" and "3"! Login possible!
VDRemote Pro is a remotecontrol for your linux based VDR (www.vdr-wiki.de) on webOS devices. Screenshots of your vdrs TV screen can also be captured. To be able to use it you need: Network access to your VDR (Wifi) and the VDR-Live-Plugin on the VDR installed (tested on 0.2.0). ***Update: Login now possible*** VDRemote is self explanatory. Set up your VDRs IP and Live-plugin-port and try it. 

The "Pro"-Version has some additional features:
-  "repeat" function, when holding down V+,V-,Ch+,Ch-,Up,Down,Left,Right
- screenshots will be updated once per second
- transparent, hideable buttons in screenshot view (i.e. to work on timers etc. via OSD)
